branch_radius.description: Radius to include branches within (in meters)

appointment_arrive_radius.description: Radius to arrive appointment within (in meters)

geo_fencing.description: Enable or disable geofencing on landing pages, 'on = enable', 'off = disable'. geofencing will only work on https protocol. if geofencing disabled, branch radius and appointment radius will be discarded

version.description: MobileTicket version [depreciated key. version in package.json and release notes instead]

customer_feedback.description: URL to redirect when a visit is ended, starting with http:// or https://.

cookie_consent.description: Enable or disable cookie consent popup in the first landing page, 'on = enable', 'off = disable'

service_fetch_interval.description: The interval (in seconds) at which service information is refreshed periodically, this setting is only used if the setting Show number of waiting customers are enabled

service_screen_timeout.description: The time duration (in minutes) which the app will stay in services screen without creating a ticket

branch_schedule.description: Enable or disable branch schedule. When enabled, ignore the branch_open_hours values.

branch_open_hours.description: Open hours of all branches in general

create_new_ticket.description: Enable or disable access to create visits using the Mobile Ticket UI, 'on=enable', 'off=disable'

show_queue_position.description: show or hide queue and queue position in the ticket

show_appointment_time.description: show or hide appointment time in the appointment ticket. If both show_queue_position and show_appointment_time are enabled, only appointment time will be shown

show_number_of_waiting_customers.description: If this setting is enabled the number of waiting customers will appear in the service list, if disabled only service names are listed.

appointment_late.description: How long is the customer allowed to arrive for his appointment (in minutes)

appointment_early.description: How early is the customer allowed to arrive for his appointment (in minutes)

timeFormat.description: Time format for showing the appointment time. Allowed settings are HH:mm, hh:mm, hh:mm a, h:mm, h:mm a

dateFormat.description: Date format for showing the appointment date. Allowed placeholders are DD MM YY YYYY

system_of_units.description: System of units which measures the distance to the branch. Can be metric (km or m), imperial (mi), auto (depending on the browser locale)

phone_number.description: Enable or disable customer phone number field in customer data section, 'enable => phone number field is visible but not mandatory', 'disable => phone number field is not visible' , 'mandatory => phone number field is visible and mandatory'

customerId.description: Enable or disable customer id field in customer data section, 'on = enable', 'off = disable'

additional_data.description: Enable or disable additonal customer data on QR scanning URL, set a value that is using in query parameter

customer_data.description: Enable or disable customer id or phone number in customer area. If both are disabled customer data section will be hidden

availability.description: Enable or disable whether customer need to create or update visit with delay

delay_visit.description: Enable or disable or define a time when customer need to create or update visit with delay

availability.description: Enable or disable service grouping, 'on = enable', 'off = disable'

single_selection.description: Enable or disable single service grouping selection, 'on = enable', 'off = disable'

service_group.description: Enable or disable or define a single selection when services show as group

privacy_policy.description: Enable or disable privacy policy when sending phone number, 'on = enable', 'off = disable'

active_consent.description: Enable or disable whether customer need to actively press button to agree privacy policy

privacy_policy_link.description: URL of privacy policy information starting with http:// or https://. If value is null privacy policy information will get from the property file.

country_code.description: Define the country code for phone number. If value is null, no country code will be added. Can be either 'ISO alpha-2 format' or 'International phone number format'. Country code will be separated if any nonnumerical code is defined.

preferred_country_list.description: Define the preferred country codes for dropdown in country code inputs. list of comma separated country codes is expected. Should be 'ISO alpha-2 format'.

queue_poll_retry.description: Define how many times should retry the queue poll request.

queue_retry_timeout.description: Define timeout for queue poll request retry if communication to Orchestra fails

block_other_browsers.description: Enable or disable whether user allow to use/open the ticket in other devices apart from the created device. 'on = enable', 'off = disable'

create_ticket_token.description: Enable or disable unique token for a ticket

logo.description: show or hide the brand logo on the footer, enable = show, disable = hide

custom_text.description: show customize text on the footer, an empty value will hide the footer

footer.description: Show or hide footer of the mobile ticket
